custom_nodes.author: Vantage with AI
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-HunyuanFoley
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for generating high-fidelity, synchronized foley audio for any video, powered by Tencent’s HunyuanVideo-Foley model.

custom_nodes.author: Justify87
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Multi-Analysis Heatmaps
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for visual comparison of two images using multiple perceptual and mathematical methods. The goal: make hidden differences visible as colorful heatmaps, so you can see where an upscaler, denoiser, or diffusion model changed your image — even when your eyes can’t tell at first glance.

custom_nodes.author: iguanesolutions
custom_nodes.title: Flux Resolution
custom_nodes.description: Get the closest compatible flux resolution from a given resolution.

custom_nodes.author: matthewfriedrichs
custom_nodes.title: Thought Bubble
custom_nodes.description: ThoughtBubble is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides an interactive canvas to build and manage your prompts in a more visual and organized way. Think of it as a whiteboard for your ideas, allowing you to link different concepts, create conditional logic, and dynamically generate prompts using a powerful set of commands.

custom_nodes.author: opparco
custom_nodes.title: Wan2.2 Lightx2v Scheduler for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node package designed specifically for Wan2.2 Lightx2v models to fix the 'burnt-out' look, over-sharpening, and abrupt lighting shifts through proper denoising trajectory alignment.

custom_nodes.author: FredBisAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI FRED Nodes v2
custom_nodes.description: FRED's enhanced custom nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: HM-RunningHub
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI IC-Custom Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates IC-Custom model for high-quality image customization and generation.

custom_nodes.author: polygoningenieur
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IC-Light-Video
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI native nodes for IC-Light with a Video node

custom_nodes.author: sumitchatterjee13
custom_nodes.title: Nuke Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive collection of ComfyUI custom nodes that replicate the functionality of popular Nuke compositing nodes. Includes merge, grade, transform, blur nodes and more for professional compositing workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Yeq6X
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Image to Video Inserter
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that inserts images into videos.

custom_nodes.author: yichengup
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SwiftCut
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI plugin that Its purpose and function is to replicate some of the editing effects of capcut,jianying and pr.

custom_nodes.author: Shellishack
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Remote Media Loaders
custom_nodes.description: Load media (image/video/audio) from remote URL

custom_nodes.author: S4MUEL404
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prepack
custom_nodes.description: A small, practical bundle of ComfyUI nodes that streamlines common workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Frief84
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LoRAWeightAxisXY
custom_nodes.description: Adds `XY Input: LoRA Weight (simple)` for Efficiency Nodes. Outputs XY subtype 'LoRA' (name, weight, weight) with a linear sweep; works with `XY Input: Checkpoint`.

custom_nodes.author: penposs
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Banana-Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that generates images using Google’s Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview API.

custom_nodes.author: PenguinTeo
custom_nodes.title: GeminiBanana for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: GeminiBanana is a custom node for ComfyUI based on the Gemini API. It allows you to call Gemini inside ComfyUI workflows to generate text, parse images, or perform multimodal interactions, greatly enhancing workflow automation and creative capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: grovergol
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Grover Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A custom node that allows opening file paths in the default system file explorer.

custom_nodes.author: noelkim12
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ComfyUI-NoelTextUtil
custom_nodes.description: Text utility nodes for file path and LoRA auto triggering

custom_nodes.author: Juste-Leo2
custom_nodes.title: Canary-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This node pack integrates the core capabilities of the Canary-1b-v2 model, providing three main features: it can transcribe audio in any of 25 supported languages into text in the same language, translate audio from 24 source languages directly into English, and translate English audio directly into one of the 24 other supported languages.

custom_nodes.author: otavanopisto
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-aihub-workflow-exposer
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI in order to expose AI workflows to external applications (particularly image, video and audio editors) so workflows can be integrated as plugins

custom_nodes.author: D3lUX3I
custom_nodes.title: VideoPromptEnhancer
custom_nodes.description: This node generates a professional prompt from an input text for modern video AI models (e.g., Alibaba Wan 2.2) via the OpenRouter API.

custom_nodes.author: dasilva333
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI HunyuanVideo-Foley Custom Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node integrates the HunyuanVideo-Foley model for generating audio from video frames and text prompts in ComfyUI. It's built for use in generating Foley sounds from video and text inputs.

custom_nodes.author: aistudynow
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-HunyuanFoley
custom_nodes.description: Generate Audio from any video and or text

custom_nodes.author: mengqin
custom_nodes.title: Unet Bnb Model Loader
custom_nodes.description: A general comfyui model loading plugin that supports loading unet models quantized in bnb-4bit (nf4 and fp4) format

custom_nodes.author: Artificial-Sweetener
custom_nodes.title: WhiteRabbit
custom_nodes.description: A nodepack designed to help you work with video from within ComfyUI that specializes in handling image batches efficiency and creating video loops.

custom_nodes.author: hujuying
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ModelScope API Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a universal custom node for ComfyUI that supports both Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image generation by calling various models via the official ModelScope API.

custom_nodes.author: itsjustregi
custom_nodes.title: SDXL Adherence
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes that improve SDXL prompt adherence and any-size/tiled VAE workflows.

custom_nodes.author: MushroomFleet
custom_nodes.title: Zenkai-POML for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Bring Microsoft's POML (Prompt Orchestration Markup Language) to your ComfyUI workflows! Create structured, reusable, and powerful prompts with visual node-based editing.

custom_nodes.author: Urabewe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Video Extend Counter
custom_nodes.description: A simple utility node that counts active Video S2V Extend nodes in your workflow and returns that number plus one. Now you don't have to remember to update the batch number. Just set your extend nodes and go. It was easy to forget so I made this quick and dirty.

custom_nodes.author: Juste-Leo2
custom_nodes.title: USO Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
Custom nodes to integrate the USO image generation model (based on FLUX.1 by ByteDance) into ComfyUI.
This project is an implementation based on the official source code from the [a/ByteDance/USO](https://github.com/bytedance/USO) repository.

custom_nodes.author: daehwa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NanoBananaAPI
custom_nodes.description: Creates images using the NanoBanana API. To use it, you must enter your issued API key.

custom_nodes.author: GsusGG
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CozyGen
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes and aiohttp server for a simple ComfyUI browser and mobile device experience for any t2i image workflow.

custom_nodes.author: annewj023
custom_nodes.title: Google Nano
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node based on OpenRouter that supports calling the Google Gemini model via the OpenAI API to generate new images from reference images and prompts.

custom_nodes.author: Ltamann
custom_nodes.title: FastVLM-7B ComfyUI Node
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-FastVLM-7B Apple A custom node for Apple’s FastVLM-7B vision-language model. This node lets you pass an image + instruction and returns a generated text response.

custom_nodes.author: KY-2000
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-save-image-enhanced
custom_nodes.description: enable to save the image without the default filename suffix, with the feature of saving caption txt file to save prompts or descriptions of the image.

custom_nodes.title: RES4LYF-tester-loop
custom_nodes.description: Batch samplers, schedulers, cfg, shift and steps tester custom node, automatic looping functionality for RES4LYF custom nodes

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PuLID_Flux_ll_FaceNet
custom_nodes.description: Same Function as original ComfyUI_PuLID_Flux_ll repository, with FaceNet Implementation that is safe for commercial usage.

custom_nodes.title: HunyuanVideo-Foley Audio Generator
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI wrapper nodes for HunyuanVideo-Foley: Generate audio from video + text prompts

custom_nodes.author: BAIKEMARK
custom_nodes.title: Civitai Recipe Finder
custom_nodes.description: A powerful node suite that finds the community's best 'recipes' for any Civitai model by analyzing top prompts, LoRA triggers, parameters, and combos.

custom_nodes.author: BAIKEMARK
custom_nodes.title: Civitai Prompt Stats Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that quickly fetches the most commonly used positive and negative prompts for Civitai models (Checkpoint / Lora) from the community, helping you effortlessly enhance your own creations!

custom_nodes.author: Dehypnotic
custom_nodes.title: AspectRatioAdvanced
custom_nodes.description: An advanced aspect ratio calculator and image scaler with flexible scaling modes and intelligent image handling.

custom_nodes.author: railep
custom_nodes.title: HunyuanVideo-Foley Audio Generator
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for generating synchronized audio for videos using the HunyuanVideo-Foley model.

custom_nodes.author: Limbicnation
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RandomSeedGenerator
custom_nodes.description: Advanced seed generator for ComfyUI with multiple modes, state persistence, and cross-library synchronization

custom_nodes.author: sfinktah
custom_nodes.title: comfy-ovum
custom_nodes.description: An assorted reliquary of nodes: mismatched, stubborn, and deliberately indistinct; they do what is required; do not ask for particulars.

custom_nodes.author: lucasgattas
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI · Egregora: Divide & Enhance
custom_nodes.description: Egregora: Divide & Enhance is a small suite of custom nodes that help you split, enhance, and recombine images, plus a clean SDXL prompt mixer that keeps things simple while staying robust with lot´s of customization.

custom_nodes.author: Gipphe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Metadata Statistics
custom_nodes.description: Gather statistics and information about your workflow.

custom_nodes.author: impactframes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI HunyuanVideo-Foley
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI custom node wrapper for the HunyuanVideo-Foley model, which generates realistic audio from video and text descriptions.

custom_nodes.author: sweetndata
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Reflatent
custom_nodes.description: NODES:Reflatent

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Utilitools Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of utility nodes for ComfyUI to improve workflow efficiency.

custom_nodes.author: aesethtics
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Utilitools Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of utility nodes for ComfyUI to improve workflow efficiency.

custom_nodes.author: fredhopp
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-flipflopnodes
custom_nodes.description: This project contains custom Flip-Flop nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Saganaki22
custom_nodes.title: dotWaveform
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node for generating animated dotted waveform visualizations with multiple animation styles including teardrop bars

custom_nodes.author: Isi-dev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DeleteModelPassthrough
custom_nodes.description:
This custom node provides a memory management utility for ComfyUI.
It allows you to delete a specific model (checkpoint, etc.) completely from VRAM and system RAM after use, while passing through any other input type unchanged (IMAGE, LATENT, CLIP, STRING, INT, CONDITIONING, VAE, etc.).
This is especially useful for low VRAM & low RAM environments, helping to reduce out-of-memory (OOM) errors in long workflows.

custom_nodes.author: netroxin
custom_nodes.title: Netro_wildcards
custom_nodes.description: Since I used 'simple wildcards' from Vanilla and it no longer works with the new Comfy UI version for me, I created an alternative. This CustomNode takes the entire contents of your wildcards-folder(comfyui wildcards) and creates a node for each one.

custom_nodes.author: mikheys
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Nano Banana Node
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a custom node for ComfyUI, 'Nano banana', designed for advanced image editing using the Google Gemini API.

custom_nodes.author: huwenkai26
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Text Remove Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI custom node designed to automatically detect and remove text from images.

custom_nodes.author: Fabio Sarracino
custom_nodes.title: VibeVoice ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI wrapper for Microsoft VibeVoice TTS model. Supports single speaker, multi-speaker, and text file loading

custom_nodes.author: Makki_Shizu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MakkiTools
custom_nodes.description: Makki's self custom nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NanoBanano
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (aka 'Nano Banana') model - the state-of-the-art image generation and editing AI.

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VibeVoice
custom_nodes.description: VibeVoice TTS. Expressive, long-form, multi-speaker conversational audio

custom_nodes.author: jtydhr88
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AudioMass
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI plugin that provides a user interface of AudioMass, originally developed by [a/AudioMass](https://github.com/pkalogiros/audiomass)

custom_nodes.author: isaac-mcfadyen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Popo Utility
custom_nodes.description:
High-Performance ComfyUI Custom Node Toolkit - Modular and Extensible Architecture
A utility toolkit designed specifically for ComfyUI image processing, built with a modular architecture that supports fast extension and the addition of new nodes.

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: SharpnessPro pour ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A collection of high-quality nodes for ComfyUI, dedicated to improving the sharpness, clarity, and texture of your images

custom_nodes.author: isaac-mcfadyen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-QwenClip
custom_nodes.description: A variety of random text encoder tools intended for use with ComfyUI and Qwen Image/Qwen Image Edit. More (may) be added as I try out various modifications to Qwen Image.

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MiniCPM
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for MiniCPM vision-language models, enabling high-quality image captioning and analysis.

custom_nodes.author: DesertPixelAi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DP Ideogram Character Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for generating consistent character images using Ideogram API v3's character reference feature. Part of the Desert Pixel (DP) node collection.

custom_nodes.author: rslosch
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EZ_Prompts
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node extension that provides easy-to-use prompt templates and wildcards for AI image generation.

custom_nodes.author: joanna910225
custom_nodes.title: HouseKeeper
custom_nodes.description: A tool that organizes workflow nodes into clean, user-friendly layouts

custom_nodes.author: alexds9
custom_nodes.title: Save Checkpoint with Metadata
custom_nodes.description: Save checkpoint .safetensors with custom header JSON, optional prompt override, merge of EXTRA_PNGINFO, and smart/no-counter filename modes. Includes text outputs for path and final metadata.

custom_nodes.author: jialuw0830
custom_nodes.title: Eigen AI FLUX API Plugin
custom_nodes.description: Eigen AI FLUX API integration for ComfyUI with LoRA support and large font prompt inputs. Features high-quality image generation using FLUX.1-schnell model with multi-LoRA support, content upscaling, and optimized prompt input interface.

custom_nodes.author: LeanModels
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DFloat11
custom_nodes.description: This repository provides the ComfyUI plugin for DFloat11 models. DFloat11 reduces model size by more than 30% while producing bit-for-bit identical outputs to the original. Unlike quantization techniques which trade quality for size, DFloat11 is a lossless compression method, preserving model output quality fully while supporting efficient inference.
